name: Clawface
description:
Get ready to exeCUTE!

Clawface is an intense, arcade-styled, twin-stick shooter where you play as an adorable robot equipped with crazy weapons and a giant face claw to fight endless waves of alien monsters!

With fast-paced combat, a dynamic level system that modifies the play field, and the ability to dual-wield weapons, Clawface challenges you to think fast and adapt to the situation. Use the claw to grab enemies and eat them, recovering health so you can last just a couple more seconds in the arena!
